mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_RESUME_M ( user_sq, address_sq, resume_ttl, resume_photo_url, resume_nm, resume_birth_dt, resume_phone_num, resume_email, resume_greeting_txt, resume_is_notification_yn, resume_is_representative_yn ) VALUES ( #{userSq}, #{addressSq}, #{resumeTtl}, #{resumePhotoUrl}, #{resumeNm}, #{resumeBirthDt}, #{resumePhoneNum}, #{resumeEmail}, #{resumeGreetingTxt}, #{resumeIsNotificationYn}, #{resumeIsRepresentativeYn} );
